comprehensive_overview: Picard is a set of command line tools for manipulating high-throughput sequencing (HTS) data and formats such as SAM/BAM/CRAM and VCF. It is primarily used for processing and analyzing next-generation sequencing (NGS) data in genomics.
core_features:
1. Processing and manipulation of HTS data
2. Quality control and metrics generation
3. Data format conversion and manipulation
4. Read group and sample information handling
5. Sequence dictionary operations
